metadata.title: To those engaging in touch development for the first time

sections.content:
Question:
I would like to know the basic touch development procedure and touch monitoring methods for the RL78 Family. Is there any documentation available?
Answer:
Please use the following application notes, which explain basic touch development procedures and touch monitoring methods.
https://www.renesas.com/document/apn/rl78-family-using-qe-and-sis-develop-capacitive-touch-applications
The above development process is also explained in a video. (The content of the video is the same as the above application notes.)
https://www.renesas.com/video/qe-capacitive-touch-tutorial-settings-rl78
https://www.renesas.com/video/qe-capacitive-touch-tutorial-tuning-rl78
https://www.renesas.com/video/qe-capacitive-touch-tutorial-serial-monitoring-rl78
We have also prepared an introduction guide for new users of capacitive touch sensors.
The guide introduces the capacitive touch detection method and features, MCU lineup, hardware, software, development environment, and evaluation kit (capacitive touch evaluation system).
Capacitive Sensor Microcontrollers CTSU Capacitive Touch Introduction Guide (R30AN0424J)
  Suitable Products
RL78/G22, RL78/G23
